name: Balor
description: The Balor is a towering, demonic figure, standing over 12 feet tall with leathery wings and clad in dark, infernal armor. It wields a fiery whip and a massive, lightning-infused sword.
memorable: The Balor embodies chaos and destruction, commanding legions of lesser demons and igniting the ground beneath it.
goals: Fueled by a thirst for destruction and chaos, the Balor seeks to dominate and obliterate its foes.
relations: May command an army of lesser demons in the Abyss.
environment: Typically found in the Abyss or other infernal realms.
strengths: Possesses exceptional Strength, high Charisma, and a variety of powerful magical and combat abilities.
weaknesses: Susceptible to damage from non-magical weapons and relies heavily on fire damage.
attacks: Uses a combination of a lightning-infused longsword and a fire whip to deal substantial damage from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: Upon death, it unleashes a catastrophic explosion, dealing extensive fire damage to all nearby creatures.
senses: Has truesight up to 120 feet, enabling it to detect invisible creatures.
skills: Skilled in intimidation and has a high perception, making it difficult to deceive.
additional_information: The fire damage dealt by the Balor bypasses resistance from creatures.
It has a powerful Fire Aura that inflicts damage to nearby creatures at the start of its turn.
Possesses Magic Resistance, granting it advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can teleport to quickly re-position in battle.
It's capable of dealing area damage with its Whip Crack ability.
